thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Sacre Coeur 18eme - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Looks more like a youth hostel than a hotel
thread.title_full: Looks more like a youth hostel than a hotel - Review of Ibis Paris Sacre Coeur 18eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alex C
title: Looks more like a youth hostel than a hotel
text: I would not recommend you stay here, I ended up paying to stay in another hotel as this place was so bad. The hotel is very cramped, rooms and public spaces are tiny and the whole place smelt slightly of vinegar. The hotel really needs refurbishing and is poor even by budget hotel standards. The rooms look tired and old. Just do yourself a favour and stay somewhere else.
